import React ,{useState} from 'react' import {Form,Button, Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Meta from '../components/Meta' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import {savePaymentMethod} from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentScreens = ({history}) => { const cart= useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress}= cart if(!shippingAddress){ history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod,setPaymentMethod]= useState('PayPal') const dispatch= useDispatch() const submitHandler= (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history.push('/placeorder') } return ( <>

Payment Method

setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
